BIO

An Individual with a demonstrated history of over four years of work experience in the software industry. Skilled in Linux, Python, JavaSvript, MS-Office, SQL, Tableau, Genesys, Selenium, Automation, Finance. Strong motivation with ability to learn skills that install confidence when assisting the end user. Comfortable with Windows/Linux/MAC platform. Communicate, convey, and visualize informed conclusions and recommendations across an organization’s leadership structure in a manner to “tell the story” behind the data. Strong academic professional with a Master of Engineering (M.Eng) focused in Software Engineering from Concordia University.
